attributes.action: Get The Hell Out Of Our Lives, and also ban pointless rolling news.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to propose that the government of this country find something better to do with their egos, and leave the good citizens to crack on with their own lives - free from the paranoia-inducing omni-presence of a disorganised, lying, cheating, tax-stealing, colloquy of incompetent fools spoiling every waking minute.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
